panels.title: Number of Iterations started per Minute

panels.description: Average Number of Connections that are being activated per second
panels.title: Connection Activation Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Credentials issued per second
panels.title: Credential Issuance Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Proof Requests verified per second
panels.title: Proof Request Verification Rate (per Second)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)

panels.title: Credential Issuance Protocol Transition Times  (in Milliseconds)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=VERIFIED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=PRESENTATION_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=VERIFIED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=PRESENTATION_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId)
)
